name: MIS BCS Section 03 Accommodation
description: OAS0017 v1.0 Report to show BCS Section 3 answers for the selected establishment.

dataset.name: MIS Sentence
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_DIM_LOCATION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK = AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SK (+)) AND ((AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, INITIALS, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, SURNAME || ', ' || INITIALS AS V_OFFENDER_SURNAME, CASE WHEN S3_ACCOMMODATION.SUPPORTED_HOUSING = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE CASE WHEN S3_ACCOMMODATION.SUPPORTED_HOUSING = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE CASE WHEN S3_ACCOMMODATION.SUPPORTED_HOUSING = 2 THEN 'Not Applicable' ELSE 'Not Answered' END END END AS SUPPORTED_HOUSING, CASE WHEN S3_ACCOMMODATION.TENANCY_ISSUES = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE CASE WHEN S3_ACCOMMODATION.TENANCY_ISSUES = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE CASE WHEN S3_ACCOMMODATION.TENANCY_ISSUES = 2 THEN 'Not Applicable' ELSE 'Not Answered' END END END AS TENANCY_ISSUES, CASE WHEN S3_ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED_ FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: S3 Accommodation
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BCS_ACC_STATUS.DESCRIPTION, LOCAL_AUTHORITY.LOCAL_AUTH_DESC, BCS_HOUSING_TYPE.DESCRIPTION AS HOUSING_TYPE, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION3.SUPPORTED_HOUSING, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION3.HOUSING_BENEFIT, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION3.SOMEWHERE_TO_LIVE, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION3.SAME_ADDRESS, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION3.TENANCY_ISSUES, DISCHARGE_LOCAL_AUTHORITY.LOCAL_AUTH_DESC AS DISCHARGE_LOCAL_AUTHORITY, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION3.S3_ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED, ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_ID, OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.BCS_PART1_COMP_DATE FROM ASSESSMENT, BCS_ACC_STATUS, LOCAL_AUTHORITY, BCS_HOUSING_TYPE, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION3, LOCAL_AUTHORITY DISCHARGE_LOCAL_AUTHORITY, OFFENDER, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID, REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY, BCS_PART_STATUS, PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON WHERE (OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = ASSESSMENT.OFFENDER_ID (+)) AND (OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.OFFENDER_ID (+)) AND (ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_ID = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.ASSESSMENT_ID AND ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_TYPE_ELM = 'TR_BCS') AND (PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON.PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON_CODE (+) = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.BCS_PURPOSE) AND (ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.ASSESSMENT_ID = ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION3.ASSESSMENT_ID) AND (ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION3.BCS_ACC_STATUS_OPOL_ID = BCS_ACC_STATUS.BCS_ACC_STATUS_OPOL_ID (+)) AND (ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION3.HOUSING_TYPE = BCS_HOUSING_TYPE.BCS_HOUSING_TYPE_CODE (+)) AND (BCS_PART_STATUS.BCS_PART_STATUS_CODE (+) = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.BCS_PART1_STATUS) AND (ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION3.CURRENT_LOCAL_AUTHORITY = LOCAL_AUTHORITY.LOCAL_AUTH_CODE (+)) AND (ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION3.DISCHARGE_LOCAL_AUTHORITY = DISCHARGE_LOCAL_AUTHORITY.LOCAL_AUTH_CODE (+)) AND (SUBSTR(OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, 1, 10) = TAGMIS_CASELOAD_SECURITY('VQL10O', OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)) AND ((REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.LATEST_OWNERSHIP_RANK = 1) AND BCS_PART_STATUS.DESCRIPTION = 'Complete' AND PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON.DESCRIPTION IN ('Basic Custody Screening - Start') AND REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.PHYSICAL_LOCATION IN ('Altcourse (HMP)'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, LOCAL_AUTH_DESC, HOUSING_TYPE, SUPPORTED_HOUSING, HOUSING_BENEFIT, SOMEWHERE_TO_LIVE, SAME_ADDRESS, TENANCY_ISSUES, DISCHARGE_LOCAL_AUTHORITY, S3_ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED, ASSESSMENT_ID, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, BCS_PART1_COMP_DATE, COUNTDISTINCT(MIS_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY ASSESSMENT_ID = V_MAX_ASSESSMENT_ID) AS V_S3_NOMS_NUMBER, SURNAME || ', ' || INITIALS AS V_OFFENDER_SURNAME, CASE WHEN S3_ACCOMMODATION.SUPPORTED_HOUSING = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE CASE WHEN S3_ACCOMMODATION.SUPPORTED_HOUSING = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE CASE WHEN S3_ACCOMMODATION.SUPPORTED_HOUSING = 2 THEN 'Not Applicable' ELSE 'Not Answered' END END END AS SUPPORTED_HOUSING, CASE WHEN S3_ACCOMMODATION.TENANCY_ISSUES = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE CASE WHEN S3_ACCOMMODATION.TENANCY_ISSUES = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE CASE WHEN S3_ACCOMMODATION.TENANCY_ISSUES = 2 THEN 'Not Applicable' ELSE 'Not Answered' END END END AS TENANCY_ISSUES, CASE WHEN S3_ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED_ FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_S3_NOMS_NUMBER
field.display: B3.11 Which local authority will you be living in when you are released?
field.legacySql: =Count([MIS Sentence].[NOMS Number];Distinct) Where ([Assessment ID] = [v_Max Assessment ID])

field.name: $ref:V_S3_NOMS_NUMBER
field.legacySql: =Count([MIS Sentence].[NOMS Number];Distinct) Where ([Assessment ID] = [v_Max Assessment ID])

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_MAX_ASSESSMENT_ID_FOR_FILTER IN (1))

field.name: $ref:V_OFFENDER_SURNAME
field.display: B3.1 What was your accommodation status before prison

field.name: $ref:SUPPORTED_HOUSING
field.display: B3.6 Are you claiming Housing Benefit? - This question will only be available if the answer to BCS3.1 is not "NFA"
field.legacySql: =If([S3 Accommodation].[Supported Housing]=0;"No";(If([S3 Accommodation].[Supported Housing]=1;"Yes";(If([S3 Accommodation].[Supported Housing]=2;"Not Applicable";"Not Answered")))))

field.name: $ref:HOUSING_BENEFIT
field.display: B3.7 Have you got somewhere to live when you leave prison?
field.legacySql: =If([S3 Accommodation].[Housing Benefit]=0;"No";(If([S3 Accommodation].[Housing Benefit]=1;"Yes";(If([S3 Accommodation].[Housing Benefit]=2;"Don't Know";"Not Answered")))))

field.name: $ref:SOMEWHERE_TO_LIVE
field.display: B3.8 Is it the same address as the one you were living at before you came into prison (B3.2 above)? -  This question will only be available if the answer to BCS3.7 is Yes
field.legacySql: =If([S3 Accommodation].[Somewhere To Live]=0;"No";(If([S3 Accommodation].[Somewhere To Live]=1;"Yes";"Don't Know")))

field.name: $ref:SAME_ADDRESS
field.display: B3.9 Are there any tenancy or rental issues with this address because you are in prison?
field.legacySql: =If([S3 Accommodation].[Same Address]=0;"No";(If([S3 Accommodation].[Same Address]=1;"Yes";(If([S3 Accommodation].[Same Address]=2;"Don't Know";"Not Answered")))))

field.name: $ref:TENANCY_ISSUES
field.display: B3.3 What local authority did you live in before you came into prison?
field.legacySql: =If([S3 Accommodation].[Tenancy Issues]=0;"No";(If([S3 Accommodation].[Tenancy Issues]=1;"Yes";(If([S3 Accommodation].[Tenancy Issues]=2;"Not Applicable";"Not Answered")))))
